statements: SELECT * FROM delivery_vehicles
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE delivery_vehicle_id = 2
SELECT delivery_vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM delivery_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC
SELECT * FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE last_update > '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM delivery_vehicles
SELECT * FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_name = 'Van'
SELECT delivery_vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM delivery_vehicles ORDER BY delivery_vehicle_id DESC
SELECT AVG(ST_X(current_location)), AVG(ST_Y(current_location)) FROM delivery_vehicles
SELECT * FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE last_update > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM delivery_vehicles
SELECT * FROM delivery_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE id = 123;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM delivery_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, status FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE vehicle_id = 456 AND status = 'In Transit';
SELECT id, vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE status = 'delivered' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE location_lat < 40 AND location_long < -100;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, status FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE vehicle_id = 3 AND status = 'in_transit' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE location_lat BETWEEN 35 AND 45 AND location_long BETWEEN -110 AND -100 ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, current_location FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT vehicle_id, start_location, end_location, route_status FROM vehicle_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT tracking_id, vehicle_id, current_location, recorded_at FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, current_location FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type='Truck';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, start_location, end_location FROM vehicle_routes WHERE route_status='Active' ORDER BY start_location ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location, recorded_at FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT tracking_id, vehicle_id, current_location, recorded_at FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE current_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY recorded_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, vehicle_id, route_description FROM vehicle_routes ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT point_id, route_id, point_sequence, point_lat, point_long FROM route_points WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY point_sequence ASC;
SELECT delivery_id, route_id, time_of_update, status FROM delivery_status WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY time_of_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, point_lat, point_long FROM vehicle_routes INNER JOIN route_points ON vehicle_routes.route_id = route_points.route_id WHERE point_sequence > 3;
SELECT route_name, status FROM vehicle_routes INNER JOIN delivery_status ON vehicle_routes.route_id = delivery_status.route_id WHERE time_of_update > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles FROM vehicles;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryVehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location, last_update FROM DeliveryVehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM DeliveryVehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM OperatorDetails WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, status FROM VehicleStatus WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM DeliveryVehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM DeliveryVehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT dh.vehicle_id, dh.location, vh.operator_name FROM VehicleHistory dh JOIN OperatorDetails vh ON dh.vehicle_id = vh.vehicle_id WHERE dh.location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(update_id) AS num_updates FROM LocationUpdates GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING num_updates > 5;
SELECT vd.vehicle_name, ls.status FROM DeliveryVehicles vd JOIN VehicleStatus ls ON vd.vehicle_id = ls.vehicle_id WHERE ls.status = 'Active' ORDER BY last_checked DESC LIMIT 10;
